name: Covidman Must Die
description:
No one can stand Covidman. Look at this jerk dancing around like he's the king of the world or something ! Come back at him by throwing random stuff at his ugly face !

-Select a camera with keys 1, 2, 3, 4

-Aim with mouse

-Charge your shot with space bar, release to throw

It's time to take the power back !

CREDITS :

Visuals :

Covidman's faces crafted with love and Blender by Valerian "Claudie Faucant" Verriest

Customizable Skybox, by Key Mouse - Licensed under Standard Unity Asset Store EULA

Polygon Apocalypse, Polygon City, Polygon Office, Polygon Town and Polygon Farm, by SyntyStudios - Licensed under Standard Unity Asset Store EULA
